articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: South Africa’s ANC loses 30-year parliamentary majority after election - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: African National Congress vote share drops to 40 percent, forcing it to seek coalition partners to form government.
articles.content: The African National Congress (ANC) party has lost its parliamentary majority in a historic election result that puts South Africa on a new political path for the first time since the end of the apar… [+2538 chars]

articles.author: AP
articles.title: ANC loses 30-year majority in South Africa's landmark election - Business Standard
articles.description: The African National Congress party lost its parliamentary majority in a historic election result Saturday that puts South Africa on a new political path for the first time since the end of the apartheid system of white minority rule 30 years ago.
articles.content:
The way to rescue South Africa is to break the ANC's majority and we have done that, said main opposition leader John Steenhuisen
